reviewText: This is a must have for true Bon Jovi fans ! I love the parts in between the videos when the guys are joking around having a good time . It gives us a chance to see the guys back when they first got started .

This is a must have for any Bon Jovi fan.  You get to know the band more intimately as well as Jon.  This is when Jon had long hair.  Also contains several of his concert clips and an MTV appearance.  I guarantee, you are going to enjoy every bit of this.

This video is awsome! Any Bon Jovi fan would love it. I did think it was a concert video though and I was pleasantly surprised when it had band interviews, live performances and a few music videos as well. A must have!
This is a must-have in any Bon Jovi fan's collection.  Back in the days of long hair and spandex the band rocked, and 25 + years later they're still filling arenas around the world!

I am a Bon Jovi collector From Old to new. This video brings back so many memories for me from when I was a kid(6yrsold) .This video is a must have for any real Bon Jovi fan. These guys really know how to rock and even from today they still are. They will ALWAYS be my favorite. Thanks Guys. Let it Rock.
A great video for any Bon Jovi fan to add to their collection!
This is a must have video for any Bon Jovi fan.  I have followed the band for over 10 years now and this is classic Bon Jovi.  These are the songs that got Bon Jovi on the map.
Incredible show plus behind the scenes interviews with members of the greatest rock band ever.
